name: Testify
description: A modern platform designed for comprehensive testing workflows, user feedback collection, and quality assurance processes. Built with cutting-edge technologies to ensure scalability and reliability.

responsibilities: Architected microservices backend with Node.js and Express
Developed React-based dashboard with advanced analytics
Implemented automated testing workflows with custom APIs
Built real-time feedback collection system using WebSockets
Configured Docker containerization and AWS deployment pipeline

features: Automated Testing Workflows with custom test runner
Real-time Feedback Collection via WebSocket connections
Advanced Analytics Dashboard with interactive charts
Team Collaboration Tools with role-based permissions
Integration APIs for third-party testing tools

metrics: Reduced testing time by 60% with automation workflows
Handling 10,000+ concurrent users in testing environment
Sub-1s response times for real-time feedback collection
highlights: Optimized database queries for high performance
